channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024101299
item.description:
Report X-2024101299

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-27T18:24:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-18
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024101299 Xray screening showed potential DG. Secondary physical search and did find Aerosols, a lighter, nail polish and nail polish remover. 4 Aerosol cans - 1 x 6.7 oz, 2 x 12 oz, 1 x 7.8 ounces 1 lighter 1 bottle fingernail polish remover x 16 ounces 6 bottles Nail polish x 0,15 ml Nail glue 1 bottle x 0.17 ounces 2. item.title: Report X-2024101460
item.description:
Report X-2024101460

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-18
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the ANCIP location a fiberboard box was dropped and the contents were exposed. Inside of the fiberboard box was six metal jerrycans that were labeled as UN1263. The outer fiberboard box did not have any DG marking or paperwork. All contents were placed into a steel salvage package and are being held at the location for the FAA.

item.title: Report X-2024101227
item.description:
Report X-2024101227

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-19
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Alaska Airlines
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While screening via X-Ray a WPX shipment bound for PDX, saw what looked to be a can of aerosol in one of the six bags. Open the bag and removed and open inner box. Found a can of disinfectant spray under a paper towel role used for padding. Also discovered in a silver Makita toolbox, two drills with batteries installed and one spare battery loose in the toolbox.

  • Description: Xray revealed possible aerosol, physical search found a 5 ounce aerosol can of sun screen in a cloth suitcase, suitcase had already been transported ANCSEA, was continuing SEABOI
